summary: Adds an Imperial Blades-wannabe to the Sleeping Giant Inn.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Blades Follower Arcixto [/size][/color][/font]

[size=4]This mod adds Arcixto Spada, a wannabe-blades agent to the Sleeping Giant Inn in Riverwood. He comes fully equipped with Blades armor minus the helmet, and wields a shield and katana in battle (and imperial bow ranged). He has high levels in blocking, archery and one-handed making him a competent melee & ranged fighter. 

[/size][i][size=4]1.2 UPDATE Arcixto is now completely standalone (asides from the requisite DLC), and the files are now conveniently packaged into .bsa format. Ran through Tes5Edit and playtested! [/size][/i][size=4]

[/size]

[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Features:[/size][/color][/font]

[list]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Marriageable [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Potential Housecarl[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Potential Steward[/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Lightfoot (will not set off traps) [/size][/color][/font]
[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Essential (cannot be killed)[/size][/color][/font]
[/list][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]
Please refer to the 'instructions' readme and the required mods section to find out what you will need for this mod to work. [/size][/color][/font]


[font=Comic Sans MS][color=#ff0000][size=5]Credits:[/size][/color][/font]

[font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4]Big Thanks to
[/size][/color][/font][list]

[*][font=Times New Roman][color=#ffffff][size=4][url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/]LogRaam[/url]﻿ for the Eyes of Beauty[/size][/color][/font]
[/list]
author: AedanStarfang
